===== Agent (OpenRouter - openai/gpt-5) ====
```
exec_shell("kubectl exec -n test-hotel-reservation profile-8b6dd7c6c-rw78q -- sh -c 'apk add --no-cache busybox-extras >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; nc -vz -w 2 mongodb-user 27017 || (echo trying_busybox_telnet && telnet mongodb-user 27017 </dev/null | head -n1 || true)'")
```
[ERROR] Docker command execution failed: sh: 1: nc: not found

